sn23.35:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.35:1.3: “yo kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.35:1.5: Rupam kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.35:1.6: vinnanam maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.35:1.7: yo kho, radha, maro; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
sn23.36:1.1: “Yo kho, radha, maradhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo …pe….
sn23.45:1.1: “Yo kho, radha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo …pe….
